title: NASA’s Webb Detects Thick Atmosphere Around Broiling Lava World
summary: Researchers using NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope have detected the strongest evidence yet for an atmosphere on a rocky planet outside our solar system, as NASA leads the world in exploring the universe from the Moon to Mars and beyond.
